scripts.buildDoc: npm run siteexport && npm run buildJsdoc && npm run cpJsdoc && npm run disableJekyll
scripts.buildJsdoc: rimraf jsDocBuild && jsdoc -c jsdoc.conf.json -R README.md -d jsDocBuild && ./bin/rename_doc.sh && ./bin/fix_doc.sh
scripts.cleanall: lerna clean && npm run cleandist && npm run cleanpacklocks && npm run cleanhiddenfiles && lerna run cleanup
scripts.deployDoc: npm run buildDoc && npm run publishDoc
scripts.lernacleanboot: npm run cleanall && npm run lernaboot
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lernacleanboot && lerna run lint && lerna run test && lerna run build
scripts.setLocalDoc: npm run buildDoc && npm run serveDoc
